member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations
member.summary: This abstract class implements every method that is used by both the FileManager and Section classes, due to a similarity in functionality.

member.name: P:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.OperationsTargetPath
member.summary: The target path to perform these operations on. This will act as the "root" of all operations.

member.name: P:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.RootPath
member.summary: The root path of the file system.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Main constructor for the AbstractBaseOperations class. Defines the operations target path.
member.param: @link{AbstractBaseOperations.OperationsTargetPath}

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.AddSection(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new section (Directory) into the file system.
member.param: The relative path of the section, relative to the root.
member.returns: The section that was just added

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.RemoveSection(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a section (Directory) from the file system.
member.param: The relative path of the section, relative to the root.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetAllSections
member.summary: Recursively searches for every section in the file system, and returns an array containing them.
member.returns: A Section[] containing the Section objects representing the directories.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetAllTopLevelSections
member.summary: Searches for every top level section in the file system, and returns an array containing them.
member.returns: A Section[] containing the Section objects representing the directories.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetSectionsNamed(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the sections (Directories) in the file system, and returns the ones matching the specified name.
member.param: The name of the sections to search for.
member.returns: A Section[] containing the objects representing each directory in the file system.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetFirstSectionNamed(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the sections (Directories) in the file system, and returns the first one with a matching name.
member.param: The name of the sections to search for.
member.returns: A Section object representing the directory in the file system.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.AddDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a document into the current Section if it doesn't exist.
member.param: The name of the document to add into the section
member.returns: The path of the document that was just added

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.RemoveDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a document from within a section, based on its relative path.
member.param: The name of the document to remove from the section

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetAllDocuments
member.summary: Iterates over every item stemming from the relative root used, filters out the files and returns an array with their full paths.
member.returns: A string[] containing every file stemming down from the root

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetAllTopLevelDocuments
member.summary: Iterates over every top level item in the operations target path and returns an array with their full paths.
member.returns: A string[] containing every top level file at the target path

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetDocumentsNamed(System.String)
member.summary: Iterates over all the files stemming from the relative root and returns every name matched file.
member.param: The filename to match with
member.returns: A string[] with all the files that matched the filename

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.abstraction.AbstractBaseOperations.GetFirstDocumentNamed(System.String)
member.summary: Iterates over all the files stemming from the relative root and returns the first name matched file.
member.param: The filename to match with
member.returns: A string containing the full path of the first matched file

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.common.FileManager
member.summary: This class implements an interface to interact with a program's file structure in a more convenient way.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.FileManager.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Main constructor for the FileManager class. Sets the root path to the specified value. If not specified, use the AppData/.PROGRAM-NAME folder.
member.param: The path to the root directory of the file system.
Whether or not to append the root to the appdata

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.common.Section
member.summary: This class represents a Section inside the File System provided by the FileManager class. It can't be instantiated by the user, and will only be accessible through the FileManager.

member.name: P:LaminariaCore_General.common.Section.SectionFullPath
member.summary: The full path for the section.

member.name: P:LaminariaCore_General.common.Section.Name
member.summary: The section name.

member.name: P:LaminariaCore_General.common.Section.SimpleName
member.summary: The simplified name of the section. This is the name without the relative path.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.common.Section.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Main constructor for the Section class. Takes in the root of the file system and the full path of the section.
member.param: The full path of the section.
The full root path of the filesystem

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils
member.summary: This class provides a wide variety of methods for quick and easy writing/reading from files.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils.EnsurePath(System.String,System.IO.FileAttributes)
member.summary: Ensures the existence of the given path, be it a directory or a file.
member.param: The path to ensure the existence of
Whether the path is a file or directory. If not specified, it will be automatically determined. This parameter accepts either a FileAttributes.Directory or FileAttributes.Normal type.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils.DumpToFile(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Writes all the given data in bulk to the specified filepath.
member.param: The filepath to dump the data into
A List(string) containing the lines to write into the file.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils.AppendToFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends a given line to the end of the file.
member.param: The filepath to append the data into
A string containing the line to write into the file.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils.ReadFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Reads all the lines from a file and returns them in the form of a list.
member.param: The filepath to read the data from
member.returns: A list containing all the lines in the file

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils.DumpToFileBinary(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Writes all the given data in bulk, as binary information, into the specified filepath.
member.param: The path to write into
The primitive values to write into the file.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils.ReadFromFileBinary(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the data in the specified filepath and returns it in the form of a list with all the values as strings.
member.param: The filepath to read the data from
member.returns: The primitive values in a list of strings

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.FileUtils.WaitForFileAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Blocks the thread waiting for a file to be released by another process and returns it as a FileStream when it eventually is.
member.param: The path of the file to get
A maximum timeout in milliseconds

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.utils.NetworkUtils
member.summary: This class contains a bunch of useful methods for interacting with the network

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.NetworkUtils.GetExternalIPAddress
member.summary: Returns the External IPv4 Address.
member.returns: A string containing the ip addr

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.NetworkUtils.GetLocalIPAddress
member.summary: Returns the Local IPv4 Address.
member.returns: A string containing the ip addr

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.NetworkUtils.GetNextAvailablePort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the next available port based on a given starting port, up until port 65534. This is done by creating a TCP socket and trying to bind the port to the local IP Address.
member.param: The port to start the binding checks on
member.returns: Either the starting port or the next available port after it

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.NetworkUtils.PortInUse(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a port is open or not, by accessing the list of active TCP listeners and checking if any endpoint has the same port as the one we're checking.
member.param: The port to check
member.returns: Whether the port is open or not

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.NetworkUtils.IsWifiConnected
member.summary: Checks if the current machine has internet connectivity.
member.returns: True if it is, false if not, or an error occured.

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.utils.PathUtils
member.summary: This class aims to provide a set of utilities to work with paths.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.PathUtils.NormalizePath(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes a path, changing it to a common format. Every path should be formatted as such.: "path/to/directory"
member.param: The path to normalize.
member.returns: The normalized path.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.PathUtils.EqualsPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares two paths, and returns true if they are equal.
member.param: The target path, the one being called through the string
The target to compare the first path with
member.returns: Whether the paths are equal or not

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.utils.ProcessUtils
member.summary: This class implements a bunch of methods to manipulate processes

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.ProcessUtils.KillProcessAndChildren(System.Diagnostics.Process,System.Int32)
member.summary: Kill a process and all of its children immediately.
member.param: The process where this method is being called from
Process ID.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.ProcessUtils.CreateProcess(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Java jar process, redirecting its STDOUT and STDERR to process it.
member.param: The java version path to run
The java args to run the jar with
The working directory of the process
member.returns: The process started

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.ProcessUtils.GetProcessById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a process object from its ID if it is still running.
member.param: The ID of the process to get
member.returns: The Process, if it is still running. Else, null

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.utils.Utf8StringWriter
member.summary: This class extends the functionality of the StringWriter class, defining its encoding in utf-8.

member.name: T:LaminariaCore_General.utils.XmlUtils
member.summary: This class offers a multitude of useful XML methods that make serializing, creating and reading XML easier. The type parameters used in this class need to be of a Serializable.

member.summary: Serializes an object into an XML string.
member.param: The object to serialize
member.returns: The serialized XML text

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.XmlUtils.SerializeToFile``1(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes an object into a given file automatically.
member.param: The filepath to add the text to
The object to serialize

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.XmlUtils.DeserializeFromFile``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes an XML object from a file.
member.typeparam: The object type to deserialize the file contents into
member.param: The path to the file to be deserialized
member.returns: An instance of T with the serialized information.

member.name: M:LaminariaCore_General.utils.XmlUtils.DeserializeFromString``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the string into an object.

member.param: The string to deserialize
member.returns: An instance of T with the serialized information.
